description:
Osprey has once again raised the bar with their most technical lineup of packs to date. Float along effortlessly on overnight or multi-day backpacking trips. The anti-slip 3D printed lumbar offers excellent ventilation and fine-tuned support. A lightweight yet strong aluminum and stainless-steel frame supports heavy loads. The Anti-Gravity suspension supports the load and holds it slightly away from your back for all-day carrying comfort. Side compression straps let you keep things streamlined as you eat through your food. The lid converts to a hipbelt, so you can bring a few items on shorter trips.

  • Made of lightweight and supple 210-denier high-tenacity weaved nylon
  • UNLTD Anti-Gravity suspension with AutoLift system to easily adjust harness length on the fly
  • 3D printed Fitscape™ Carbon DLS™ lumbar is first of its kind
  • Fit-on-the-Fly hipbelt for quick adjustments on the trail
  • Zippered hipbelt pockets with twin front pockets provide secure storage
  • Dual tool loops with bungee tie-offs carry ice axes
  • Stow-on-the-Go trekking pole attachments let you stash your poles without removing the pack
  • Separate divider for sleeping bag storage
  • Clamshell compression system with side straps
  • Removable floating top lid can be converted into a waist pack
  • External hydration sleeve holds a 3L reservoir (sold separately)
  • Includes a nylon ripstop rain cover and airport transit over
name: Osprey UNLTD AntiGravity 64 Backpack - Women's
